author: The Babylon Bee
description:
Meet John Larson, a paraplegic firefighter who is breaking barriers, much like the pit bull that broke both of his legs. John's leadership is giving a huge leg up (not literally) to the first responder scene. His inspiring story encourages others to stand tall in the midst of adversity even though he cannot.

title: Meet The LAFD's First Paraplegic Firefighter
